default_bouquet.name: The Chelsea
default_bouquet.description:
When we launched our limited edition Chelsea Flower Show bouquet earlier this year, we knew she was a winner. 

You loved her. We loved her. So we couldn’t resist bringing this beautiful bouquet of roses, lisianthus and eucalyptus back.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Chelsea, a show-stopping bouquet of altitude roses, pink lisianthus and fragrant eucalyptus.
To enjoy your flowers for many days to come, simply trim the ends of each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding them to your chosen vase. 
The roses are the centrepiece of this bouquet, so position these in your vase first, alternating between the darker pink and soft pink roses. Trim the lisianthus to different heights and position inbetween the roses.
Finally add the white limonim and eucalyptus around the outside of the arrangement to soften the outline of the bouquet, to evoke the feeling of exuberant wildflowers. 
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
When we launched our limited edition Chelsea Flower Show bouquet earlier this year, we knew she was a winner. 

You loved her. We loved her. So we couldn’t resist bringing this beauty back for the Summer. 

Altitude roses, delicate pink lisianthus and baby blue eucalyptus mean that this bouquet is sure to win the heart of the lucky recipient.

default_bouquet.name: The Penelope
default_bouquet.description:
All good things must come to an end, and sadly peony season is no exception. 

For this week only, send these pillow-soft peonies straight through their letterbox, and celebrate this most beautiful of blooms.
default_bouquet.instructions:
To enjoy these pillow-soft flowers for as long as possible, first snip the ends of each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. 
You might like to trim some stems shorter and position these flowers at the front of your bouquet to give your arrangement a rounder shape. 
Finally, add the eucalyptus around the outside of the arrangement to create a collar-effect. The green leaves against the pink will help these stunning flowers shine. 
Visit us on instagram @bloomandwild for more peony pics, and share you own on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram using the hashtag #OhMyPeony. We can't wait to see them!
default_bouquet.long_description:
All good things must come to an end, and sadly peony season is no exception. 

But we're going out with a bloom, with this limited edition arrangement of Sarah Bernhardt peonies and fragrant eucalyptus. 

For this week only, send these pillow-soft peonies straight through their letterbox, and celebrate this most beautiful of blooms.

default_bouquet.name: The Joni
default_bouquet.description:
Inspired by the laid-back vibes of festival season we've created The Joni, a bohemian bouquet of pure white lilies with vintage La Belle roses.
Available for this week only, and delivered through their letterbox, The Joni is the perfect way to share the love this Summer.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Joni, a bohemian bouqet designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you.
To delight in your blooms for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your flowers at their best. 
The lilies are the centrepiece of this bouquet, so position these in your vase first. Trim the roses and lisianthus to different heights and arrange around the lilies.
Finally slide the limonium inbetween the blooms for a free spirit feel.
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
>"We love our lovin', but not like we love our freedom"
- Joni Mitchell 

We're feeling the love this Summer, and inspired by the laid-back vibes of festival season we've created The Joni. This bohemian bouquet combines pure white lilies with vintage La Belle roses and lilac lisianthus for a free spirit feel.

Available for this week only, and delivered through their letterbox, The Joni is the perfect way to share the love this Summer.
default_bouquet.contents:
* 5 Altitude Rose Pale pink - Labelle
* 2 Lily LA Lily White
* 2 Limonium	 Lilac
* 3 Lisianthus Lilac

default_bouquet.name: The Eliza
default_bouquet.description: Our favourite flowers united in honour of our favourite flower girl. Pillow-soft peonies nestle alongside delicate pink roses and fragrant eucalyptus in a bouquet every bit as exuberant as its namesake.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Eliza, a bouquet seasonal peonies and altitude roses designed by our florist in honour of our favourite flower girl, the bloomin' lovely Eliza Doolittle. 
To enjoy these pillow-soft flowers for as long as possible, first trim the ends of each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. 
Peonies have a very short season in the UK, so let these stunning blooms shine by making them the star of your bouquet. Position them in your vase first, then add the roses around them, alternating between the dark pink and softer pink varieties. 
Finally add the white limonim and eucalyptus around the outside of the arrangement to soften the outline of the bouquet, to evoke the feeling of exuberant wildflowers. 
Visit us on instagram @bloomandwild for more peony pics, and share you own on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram using the hashtag #OhMyPeony. We can't wait to see them!
default_bouquet.long_description:
"The difference between a lady and a flower girl is not how she behaves, but how she's treated."
 - George Bernard Shaw, *Pygmalion* 

Our favourite flowers united in honour of our favourite flower girl. Pillow-soft peonies nestle alongside delicate pink roses and fragrant eucalyptus in a bouquet every bit as exuberant as its namesake. 

Sourced exclusively from high-altitude farms positioned on the side of a volcano, our roses are as long-lasting as they are beautiful.

default_bouquet.name: Princess Charlotte
default_bouquet.description:
Introducing another new arrival, Princess Charlotte - an exclusive arrangement of lilac bloom chrystanthemum and alstroemeria designed to commemorate the birth of HRH Princess Charlotte of Cambridge.

Available for this week only, this perfectly pink bouquet is fit for a Princess.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Your Bloom & Wild bouquet was designed by our florist and arranged by hand for you. 
You have received The Princess Charlotte, our exclusive arrangement designed to celebrate the birth of HRH Princess Charlotte of Cambridge. 
The arrangement comprises lilac bloom chrysanthemum, bi-colour alstroemeria, white stallion chrysanthemum, white sandriana, white hypericum and eucalyptus. 
Gather the white sandriana leaves, hypericum berries and eucalyptus to create a base for your arrangement. Intersperse the alstromeria and stallion throughout your foliage to add height. 
Finally, trim the lilac blooms to different lengths, and arrange at the front of your bouquet for a stunning focal point.
default_bouquet.long_description:
Introducing another new arrival, Princess Charlotte - an exclusive arrangement of lilac bloom chrystanthemum and alstroemeria designed to commemorate the birth of HRH Princess Charlotte of Cambridge.

Available for this week only, this perfectly pink bouquet is fit for a Princess.

default_bouquet.name: The Frances
default_bouquet.description: Discover this sweet Summer bouquet of yellow and white alstroemeria, madiba and solidago, inspired by a classic English country garden and delivered in our unique Letterbox.
default_bouquet.instructions:
You have received The Frances, a sweet Summer bouquet of white and yellow alstroemeria, madiba and solidago, inspired by a classic English country garden. 
So you can enjoy your flowers for as long as possible our alstroemeria is delivered in bud, ready to bloom. 
To extend the vase life of your bouquet further, first trim the ends of each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase.
The alstroemeria are the star of this bouquet so first gather these together, alternating between yellow and white blooms for a varied display. Break your madiba into smaller bunches and intersperse between the alstroemeria. 
Finish your arrangement by positioning the solidago around the edge of the vase to soften the shape of the arrangement.
default_bouquet.long_description:
*If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.*  
                                    ― Frances Hodgson Burnett, The Secret Garden

Discover this sweet Summer bouquet of yellow and white alstroemeria, madiba and solidago, inspired by a classic English country garden and delivered in our unique Letterbox. 
Sometimes known as the Peruvian lily, this alstroemeria arrangement will fill their home with flowers for many days to come.

default_bouquet.name: The Charlotte
default_bouquet.description: The cool colours of The Charlotte reflect the wintery weather, but these beautiful blooms are a welcome reminder that warmer days are on the way.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Your Bloom & Wild bouquet was designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you.
Introducing The Charlotte; the cool colour palette reflects the wintery weather, but is a welcome reminder that warmer days are on the way.
Lisianthus are the star of this bouquet but like any leading lady, they need support. Begin by creating a framework of hypericum berries, ruscus leaves, and eucalyptus. 
Enhance the arrangement with the madiba and spiky eryngium. You might like to break up the madiba into smaller bunches for more variety in your bouquet. 
Finally, distribute lisinathus and statice throughout to add colour and complete your bouquet.
default_bouquet.long_description: The cool colours of The Charlotte reflect the wintery weather, but these beautiful blooms are a welcome reminder that warmer days are on the way.

default_bouquet.name: The Marianne
default_bouquet.description: When words aren't enough, The Marianne says it all. Oriental liles, vintage apple tea carnations and peach alstroemeria combine in this bright Letterbox bouquet for a gift that will leave them speechless.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Marianne, a bright Summer bouquet designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you.
To delight in your blooms for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your flowers at their best. 
The lilies are the centrepiece of this bouquet, so position these in your vase first. Trim the alstroemeria and apple tea carnations to different heights and arrange around the lilies.
Slide the sandriana and pitto leaves inbetween the flower stems to give the bouquet shape, and finish by positioning the limonium around the edge of the bouquet to soften the outline of the arrangement. 
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
"And sometimes I have kept my feelings to myself, because I could find no language to describe them in."  
           - Jane Austen, *Sense and Sensibility*

When you can't find the words, The Marianne says it all. Oriental liles, vintage apple tea carnations and peach alstroemeria combine in this bright Letterbox bouquet for a gift that will leave them speechless.

default_bouquet.name: The Juliet
default_bouquet.description: A rose by any other name might smell as sweet, but this stunning bouquet of a dozen long-stemmed deep red roses could only be The Juliet. Delivered in our unique Letterbox, it's a timeless Valentine's gift for any star-crossed lovers.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Your Bloom & Wild bouquet was designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you. Introducing The Juliet, a simply stunning display of 12 long-stemmed deep red roses. 
To arrange The Juliet, carefully remove the protective netting from each rose and trim the stems diagonally a few centimetres from the end. 
At Bloom & Wild we love the simplicity of roses of the same height, but you might like to cut a few stems shorter to place at the front of the bouquet to created a graduated display. 
The head of each rose will gradually open out over time, but to enjoy your bouquet for as long as possible strip any leaves that fall below the waterline and continue to trim the stems every few days.
default_bouquet.long_description: A rose by any other name might smell as sweet, but this stunning bouquet of a dozen long-stemmed deep red roses could only be The Juliet. Delivered in our unique Letterbox, it's a timeless Valentine's gift for any star-crossed lovers.

default_bouquet.name: The Eleanor
default_bouquet.description: Get ready to fall head over heels for The Eleanor, a delicate blush bouquet featuring alstroemeria, vintage apple-tea carnations and soft peach lilies.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Eleanor, a delicate peach-blush bouqet designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you.
To delight in your blooms for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your flowers at their best. 
The lilies are the centrepiece of this bouquet, so position these in your vase first. Trim the alstroemeria and apple tea carnations to different heights and arrange around the lilies.
Finally slide the green ruscus around the neck of the vase to complement the peach tones. 
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
>“Know your own happiness" 
- Jane Austen, *Sense and Sensibility* 

Get ready to fall head over heels for The Eleanor, a delicate blush bouquet featuring alstroemeria, vintage apple-tea carnations and soft peach lilies. 

Lovingly prepared by hand and delivered through the door in our unique Letterbox, this is a bouquet they can't help but fall for.

default_bouquet.name: The Alice
default_bouquet.description: The Alice is a whimsical wonderland of blushing pinks. Comprising Asiatic lilies, pale pink alstroemeria, lisianthus and waxflower, it's the perfect Spring time bouquet.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Your Bloom & Wild bouquet was designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you. You've received The Alice, a whimsical wonderland of blushing pinks. Comprising Asiatic lilies, pale pink alstroemeria, lisianthus and waxflower, it's the perfect Spring time bouquet. 

Begin to arrange your bouquet by gathering your eucalyptus robusta, waxflower and madiba to create a full base. You might like to break up the madiba into smaller bunches for more variety in your bouquet.
Next, evenly distribute the lisianthus and alstroemeria throughout, before positioning the liles at the front of your arrangement for a beautiful focal point.
default_bouquet.long_description: The Alice is a whimsical wonderland of blushing pinks. Comprising Asiatic lilies, pale pink alstroemeria, lisianthus and waxflower, it's the perfect Spring time bouquet.

default_bouquet.name: The Gloria
default_bouquet.description: Inspired by the beauty and decadence of New York during the Jazz Age, The Gloria is a stunning statement bouquet that's sure to wow.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Gloria, a bouquet designed by our florist and inspired by the beauty and decadence of Jazz Age New York.
To enjoy your blooms for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your flowers at their best. 
The lilies are the centrepiece of this bouquet, so position these in your vase first. Trim the alstroemeria and lisianthus to different heights and arrange around the lilies to give the bouquet shape. 
Slide the large leaf eucalyptus around the edge of the vase to create a collar-effect, and finish by nestling the hypericum berries at intervals throughout the display. 
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
“She was dazzling-- alight; it was agony to comprehend her beauty in a glance.”  
 ― F. Scott Fitzgerald, *The Beautiful And Damned*

Inspired by the beauty and decadence of New York during the Jazz Age, The Gloria embodies the freedom and excess of the era. 

Bold purples and timeless white lilies combine in this stunning statement bouquet that's sure to wow.

default_bouquet.name: The Lucy
default_bouquet.description: Add a touch of sophisticated winter sparkle with The Lucy. Inspired by the snowy forests of Narnia, this arrangement combines white bloom chrystanthemums, eryngium orion, fir and hypericum berries.
default_bouquet.instructions:
The Lucy was designed by our florist and chosen for you. Inspired by the snowy forests of Narnia, the arrangement combines white bloom chrystanthemums, eryngium orion and hypericum berries with a touch of winter sparkle.
Gather the laurel, pistachio and eucalyptus to create a base for your arrangement. Intersperse the berries and eryngium throughout and place birch twigs around the edges of the foliage to add height. 
Finally, trim the white blooms to different lengths, and arrange in the centre of your bouquet for a stunning focal point.
default_bouquet.long_description: Add a touch of sophisticated winter sparkle with The Lucy. Inspired by the snowy forests of Narnia, this arrangement combines white bloom chrystanthemums, eryngium orion, fir and hypericum berries.

default_bouquet.name: The Beatrix
default_bouquet.description: Velvety petals and festive fragrances combine with a hint of Christmas sparkle in this traditional Christmas arrangement, featuring burgundy carnations, rosemary, cinnamon and fir.
default_bouquet.instructions:
The Beatrix was designed by our florist and chosen for you. Velvety petals and festive fragrances combine with a hint of gold in this traditional arrangement that features burgundy carnations, rosemary, cinnamon and fir.
Gather the fir, ruscus and rosemary to create a base for your arrangement. Keeping the bear grass tied together, insert this in the centre of the foliage. 
Intersperse the carnations, leucadenron and eryngium throughout. Finally, position the cinnamon and hypericum berries, and pull out individual strands of bear grass for movement and height.
default_bouquet.long_description: Velvety petals and festive fragrances combine with a hint of Christmas sparkle in this traditional Christmas arrangement, featuring burgundy carnations, rosemary, cinnamon and fir.

skus.name: The Emma
skus.description: The Emma is a classic set of flowers, they look delightful.

default_bouquet.name: The Emma
default_bouquet.description: Introducing The Emma; exuberant, irrepressible and bursting with beauty. It comprises pink Asiatic lilies, pale pink alstroemeria, bi-colour lisianthus,and pink waxflower.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Your Bloom & Wild bouquet was designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you. Introducing The Emma; exuberant, irrepressible and bursting with beauty. 
It comprises Asiatic lilies, pale pink alstroemeria, bi-colour lisianthus,and pink waxflower.
Begin to arrange your bouquet by gathering your pitto leaves,the waxflower and madiba to create a full base. You might like to break up the madiba into smaller bunches for more variety in your bouquet. 
Next, evenly distribute the lisianthus and alstroemeria throughout, before finally positioning the liles at the front of your arrangement for a beautiful focal point.
default_bouquet.long_description: Introducing The Emma; exuberant, irrepressible and bursting with beauty. It comprises pink Asiatic lilies, pale pink alstroemeria, bi-colour lisianthus,and pink waxflower.

skus.name: The Amelia
skus.description: The Amelia is a classic set of flowers, they look delightful.

default_bouquet.name: The Amelia
default_bouquet.description: The Amelia is peachy keen and eager to please. It is made up of peach lilies, apple tea carnations, cream madiba, varigated pitto leaves and sugar flair hypericum.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Your arrangement is The Amelia; peachy keen and eager to please.
Trim all your stems to the same length, at a 45 degree angle. 
Start by adding your variegated pitto leaves and sugar flair hypericum berries to create a full base.
Now slot in your peach lilies, apple tea carnations and cream madiba, ensuring that each variety is evenly distributed throughout your arrangement.
default_bouquet.long_description: The Amelia is peachy keen and eager to please. It is made up of peach lilies, apple tea carnations, cream madiba, varigated pitto leaves and sugar flair hypericum.

skus.name: The Minerva
skus.description: The Minerva is a classic set of flowers, they look delightful.

default_bouquet.name: The Minerva
default_bouquet.description: The Minerva is inspired by the strength, wisdom and beauty of the goddess of a thousand words. It is made up of liatris, lilac bloom chrysanthemums, Minerva carnations, madiba and cordyline red top and ruscus.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Introducing The Minerva, inspired by the strength, wisdom and beauty of the goddess of a thousand words.
Firstly, add your glossy ruscus and eucaplytus leaves to the vase to support your other flowers.
Cut the pointed purple liatris so they are taller than your foliage and add into the vase.
Trim the lilac chrysanthemum blooms, madiba and Minerva carnations so they sit lower than the liatris to give added depth and dimension.
default_bouquet.long_description: The Minerva is inspired by the strength, wisdom and beauty of the goddess of a thousand words. It is made up of liatris, lilac bloom chrysanthemums, Minerva carnations, madiba and cordyline red top and ruscus.

default_bouquet.name: The Rosalind
default_bouquet.description:
This stunning bouquet of a dozen delicately pink roses is the perfect gift. Every stem is hand packed, with each head individually netted to protect every petal. 
Sourced from specialist high-altitude growers, the roses are unusually large and long-lasting meaning your loved one will enjoy their gift for many days to come.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Your Bloom & Wild bouquet was designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you. Introducing The Rosalind, a simply stunning display of 12 long-stemmed pink avalance roses. 
To arrange The Rosalind, carefully remove the protective netting from each rose and diagonally trim the stems a few centimetres from the end.  
You may like to remove the outer 'guard' petals too. This may not be necessary, but as these are the flower's own way of protecting the inner petals they are older than the rest. 
At Bloom & Wild we love the simplicity of roses of the same height, but you might like to cut a few stems shorter to place at the front of the bouquet to create a graduated arrangement. 
The head of each rose will continue to open out, but to enjoy your bouquet for as long as possible just trim the stems every few days.
default_bouquet.long_description:
This stunning bouquet of a dozen delicately pink roses is the perfect gift. Every stem is hand packed, with each head individually netted to protect every petal. 
Sourced from specialist high-altitude growers, the roses are unusually large and long-lasting meaning your loved one will enjoy their gift for many days to come.

default_bouquet.name: The Athena
default_bouquet.description: Share the love this Summer with The Athena. A classic arrangement of white lilies, altitude roses and lisianthus, this elegant hand-tied bouquet will be a delight in any home.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Athena, a classic arrangement of white lilies, altitude roses and lisianthus.
To enjoy your blooms for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your flowers at their best. 
Grown on the side of an African volcano, altitude roses are famously long lasting, and so your home should be full of flowers for many days to come.  
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging advice and inspiration, and don't forget to share your flowers with us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter - we're @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
"A heart that loves is always young."  
 - Ancient Greek proverb 

Share the love this Summer with The Athena. A classic arrangement of white lilies, altitude roses and lisianthus, this elegant hand-tied bouquet will be a delight in any home.

default_bouquet.name: The Sylvia
default_bouquet.description: Introducing The Sylvia, an alluring bouquet of deep purples and rich berry tones. Velvety Nicoletta roses and elegant calla lilies complete this enthralling arrangement.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Introducing The Sylvia, an alluring bouquet of deep purples and rich berry tones. 
The velvety petals of Nicoletta roses soften the stems of spiky eryngium, while the sleek purple compacta, smoky pussy willow and elegant calla lilies complete this enthralling arrangement.
Designed by our florist and arranged by hand for you, The Sylvia is ready to be displayed in your favourite vase. 
Just cut each stem diagonally about 3cm from the end, and re-trim every few days to enjoy your bouquet for as long as possible.
default_bouquet.long_description: Introducing The Sylvia, an alluring bouquet of deep purples and rich berry tones. Velvety Nicoletta roses and elegant calla lilies complete this enthralling arrangement.

default_bouquet.name: The Aurora
default_bouquet.description: We've brought together two of our most-loved blooms in this fairytale bouquet. Fragrant oriental lilies and pink altitude roses are the perfect match.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Aurora, a bouquet as bright and beautiful as the dawn. 
Designed by our florist and arranged by hand for you, The Aurora is a fairytale combination of white oriental lilies, pink altitue roses and bursts of limonium. 
To enjoy your blooms for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your flowers at their best. 
As your bouquet blooms it will become more and more beautiful each day. You can share your flowers with us on instagram and twitter @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
"They named her after the dawn, for she filled their lives with sunshine."
 - Sleeping Beauty 

We've brought together two of our most-loved blooms in this fairytale bouquet. Fragrant oriental lilies and pink altitude roses are the perfect match. Hand-tied by our florists and delivered to their door, this bouquet will become more stunning every day, as each flower awakens to reveal is true beauty.

Introducing The Rebecca, a dark and alluring bouquet, as captivating as its namesake. Plum calla lilies, purple brassica and altitude roses united with eucalyptus and aralia make for an irresistible arrangement that will never be forgotten.
Designed by our florist and arranged by hand for you, The Rebecca is ready to be displayed in your favourite vase. Just cut each stem diagonally about 3cm from the end, and re-trim every few days to enjoy your bouquet for as long as possible.

default_bouquet.name: The Virginia
default_bouquet.description: The early morning light falls through a window in Bloomsbury where The Virginia sits; avalanche roses, green shamrock blooms and white lisianthus united in cool sophistication. A modern classic.
default_bouquet.instructions:
The early morning light falls through a window in Bloomsbury where The Virginia sits; avalanche roses, green shamrock blooms and white lisianthus, united with eucalyptus robusa and aralia in cool sophistication. A modern classic.

default_bouquet.description: Introducing The Hester, a stunning scarlet arrangement of Amaryllis, altitude roses and red hypericum. The addition of pussy willow and blue prince holly make this the ultimate Christmas arrangement.

default_bouquet.name: The Viola
default_bouquet.description: The Viola, a bouquet of deep purples and smoky greys, is inspired by Shakespeare's feistiest heroine. Bolero calla lilies and purple brassica, united with blue eryngium and pussy willow, create an irresistible display with a rock and roll edge.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Introducing The Viola, a bouquet of deep purples and smoky greys, inspired by Shakespeare's feisty heroine. Bolero calla lilies and purple brassica, united with blue eryngium and pussy willow, create an irresistible display with a rock and roll edge.
Designed by our florist and arranged by hand for you, The Viola is ready to be displayed in your favourite vase. Just cut each stem diagonally about 3cm from the end, and re-trim every few days to enjoy your bouquet for as long as possible.
default_bouquet.long_description: The Viola, a bouquet of deep purples and smoky greys, is inspired by Shakespeare's feistiest heroine. Bolero calla lilies and purple brassica, united with blue eryngium and pussy willow, create an irresistible display with a rock and roll edge.

default_bouquet.name: The Ophelia
default_bouquet.description: A riot of colour, The Ophelia is an irresistible hand tied bouquet. The heady scent of stocks and eucalyptus will fill the air for many days to come, making The Ophelia an intoxicating and unforgettable gift.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Ophelia, a riot of Summer colour with an irresistable scent. 
Designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you, The Ophelia comprises purple, lilac and cerise stocks, altitude roses and fragrant eucalyptus. 
To enjoy your blooms for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45 degree angle before adding to your chosen vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water often to keep your flowers at their best. 
Like many Summer flowers, stocks don't need lots of water. A quarter of a vase should be enough, but just but make sure you top it up regularly so they don't dry out. 
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging advice and inspiration, and don't forget to share your flowers with us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter - we're @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
There’s rosemary, that’s for remembrance. Pray you, love, remember.  
 ― William Shakespeare, *Hamlet*

A riot of colour, The Ophelia is an irresistible hand tied bouquet. The heady scent of stocks and eucalyptus will fill the air for many days to come, making The Ophelia an intoxicating and unforgettable gift.

default_bouquet.name: The Isabel
default_bouquet.description: The Isabel is picture perfect. A bouquet of 18 long-stemmed altitude roses, with each petal blushing a delicate pink. A gift that speaks a thousand words.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Introducing the The Isabel. A picture perfect arrangement of 18 long-stemmed altitude roses, each petal blushing a delicate pink. 
Designed by our florist and arranged by hand for you, The Isabel is ready to be displayed in your favourite vase. 
Just cut each stem diagonally about 3cm from the end, and re-trim every few days to enjoy your bouquet for as long as possible.
You may like to remove the outer 'guard' petals too. This isn't always necessary, but as these are the flower's own way of protecting the inner petals they are older than the rest.
default_bouquet.long_description: The Isabel is picture perfect. A bouquet of 18 long-stemmed altitude roses, with each petal blushing a delicate pink. A gift that speaks a thousand words.

skus.name: The Georgiana
skus.description: The Georgiana is a classic set of flowers, they look delightful.

default_bouquet.name: The Georgiana
default_bouquet.description: Vintage bella roses and faded pink and green hydrangea evoke the shapes and silks of the Regency era. A regal arrangement, inspired by London’s first trend setter.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Vintage bella roses and faded pink and green hydrangea evoke the shapes and silks of the Regency era. A regal arrangement, inspired by one of London’s greatest beauties. The Georgiana comprises vintage bella roses, faded pink and green hydrangea, pale lilac and pink blooms and lilac brassica, enveloped in a collar of cordyline compacta, sedum and aralia leaf.
Designed by our florist and arranged by hand for you, The Georgiana is ready to be displayed in your favourite vase. Just cut each stem diagonally about 3cm from the end, and re-trim every few days to enjoy your bouquet for as long as possible.
default_bouquet.long_description: Vintage bella roses and faded pink and green hydrangea evoke the shapes and silks of the Regency era. A regal arrangement, inspired by London’s first trend setter.

default_bouquet.long_description: A riot of altitude roses, delicate hypericum berries and, dianthus green trix, The Scarlett is a dramatic tribute to the stunning Southern belle.

default_bouquet.description:
Indulge someone special with box of 8 irresistible Belgian chocolates​ from renowned chocolatiers Amelie Chocolat​. We've exclusively partnered with Amelie to create this luxurious gift. A meltingly delicious selection of Belgian chocolates, beautifully presented alongside our fresh flower bouquets in our unique Letterbox.  
Contains: Milk, Lactose, Nuts, Soya, Alcohol.​

A meltingly delicious selection of Belgian chocolates, beautifully presented alongside our fresh flower bouquets in our unique Letterbox.

default_bouquet.name: Crabtree & Evelyn Rosewater Hand Therapy
default_bouquet.description:
For a thoughtful touch of luxury, add Crabtree & Evelyn’s Rosewater Hand Therapy to a fresh flower bouquet, beautifully presented in our unique box.

Rosewater Hand Therapy is an intensive conditioning cream, lightly scented with rosewater and formulated with shea butter to moisturise and soften hands.
default_bouquet.long_description:
For a thoughtful touch of luxury, add Crabtree & Evelyn’s Rosewater Hand Therapy to a fresh flower bouquet, beautifully presented in our unique box.

Rosewater Hand Therapy is an intensive conditioning cream, lightly scented with rosewater and formulated with shea butter to moisturise and soften hands.

default_bouquet.name: The Dora
default_bouquet.description: The Dora is the antidote to April showers. Send 150 golden daffodils, delivered through their door, with 8 irresistibly nutty chocolate eggs to make their Easter even sweeter.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Dora - a gift of 150 golden daffodils, and 8 praline chocolate eggs, designed by our florist to make your Easter sweeter. 
To enjoy your flowers for many days to come, simply trim the ends of each stem at a 45° angle before adding them to your chosen vase. 
Like many Spring flowers, daffodils don't need much water - a couple of centimetres at most. Too much water in the vase will shorten the life of your flowers.
Why not split your daffodils into smaller bunches and spread them throughout your home? We like to use different jars, vases, jugs to create a simple but stunning Spring display.
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
*A house with daffodils in it is a house lit up, whether or no the sun be shining outside*  
                                    - A.A Milne

Fill their home with Spring sunshine and send The Dora, the antidote to April showers. 
 
This gift of golden daffodils, delivered through their door and accompanied by 8 irresistably nutty chocolate eggs, will be sure to make their Easter even sweeter. 

Contains: Milk, Lactose, Nuts, Soya.

default_bouquet.name: A Pot of Rosy
default_bouquet.description: We're big believers in the power of Tea-L-C, so we asked Joe and his Tea Co. to curate a selection of tongue-tingling Summer teas for the ultimate feel-good gift.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy A Pot of Rosy, a selection of tongue-tingling Summer teas curated by Joe's Tea Co. 
He's included three of his favourite fruity flavours, as well as a variety of individual matchbox teabags for you to explore.
At Bloom & Wild we're big believers in the power of Tea-L-C, so sit back, tea-lax and enjoy.  
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com where we've shared some tea-licious recipies that we've been sipping on, including fruity iced-teas and elegant twists on classic cocktails.
default_bouquet.long_description: "I love how tea can bring people together and I wanted to create a range of fine tea with a no nonsense approach." - Joe, Joe's Tea Co. We're big believers in the power of Tea-L-C, so we asked Joe and his Tea Co. to curate a selection of tongue-tingling Summer teas for the ultimate feel-good gift. 1 box Minted Up Fruit Tea Bags x 15, 1 box Berry Best Tea Bags x 15, 1 box St Clement's Lemon Tea Bags x 15, 1 x Ever-So-English Breakfast Matchbox Tea, 1 x Proper Peppermint Matchbox Tea, 1 x Queen of Green Matchbox Tea, 1 x The Earl of Grey Matchbox Tea, 1 x Sweet Chamomile Matchbox Tea, 1 x 2 cup black teapot

default_bouquet.name: The Grace
default_bouquet.description:
Give a pop of colour with The Grace, a simply beautiful twin-stem orchid. 

Delivered to their door and presented in a stylish black ceramic pot, this long-lasting gift is an elegant way to mark a special occasion.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Introducing The Grace, a simply beautiful twin-stem orchid inspired by the timeless elegance of Grace Kelly. 
To enjoy your orchid, simply snip the tie securing the stem and remove from the box. Remove the wrapping from around the inner container and place whole into the ceramic pot. Finally take the moss from the envelope included and pat down around the base of the stem. 
Orchids have a bit of a diva-reputation, but caring for them needn't be tricky. To water submerge the inner plastic pot (containing the root ball) in a bowl of water, making sure it doesn't rise above the leaf line. Hold for ten minutes, and return to the ceramic pot. Repeat this every three weeks to keep your orchid happy. 
Avoid placing your orchid in direct sunlight, but they don't like it to be cold either - a warm room would be ideal.
default_bouquet.long_description:
>“To have complete satisfaction from flowers you must have time to spend with them. I talk to them and they talk to me" 
 - Grace Kelly, *My Book of Flowers* 

Give a pop of colour with The Grace, a simply beautiful twin-stem orchid. 

Delivered to their door and presented in a stylish black ceramic pot, this long-lasting gift is an elegant way to mark a special occasion.
default_bouquet.long_instructions:
Introducing The Grace, a simply beautiful twin-stem orchid inspired by the timeless elegance of Grace Kelly. 

To enjoy your orchid, simply snip the tie securing the stem and remove from the box. Remove the wrapping from around the inner container and place  whole into the ceramic pot. Finally take the moss from the envelope included and pat down around the 

Orchids have a bit of a diva-reputation, but caring for them needn't be tricky. To water, remove the inner plastic container and submerge in a bowl of water, making sure it doesn't rise above the leaf line. Hold for ten minutes, and return to the ceramic pot. Repeat this every three weeks to keep your orchid happy. Also, avoid placing your orchid in direct sunlight, but they don't like it to be cold either - a warm room would be ideal. 

We'd love to see The Grace in her new home! You can share your snaps with us on Instagram @bloomandwild.

default_bouquet.name: The Fitzgerald
default_bouquet.description: Shake up Father's Day this year with our Gatsby-inspired gin cocktail kit. Curated by expert mixologists at Tipple Box, your Dad can relax with a refreshing drink on the day.
default_bouquet.instructions:
Introducing The Fitzgerald, our Gatsby-inspired gin cocktail kit curated exclusively for us by the expert mixologists at Tipple Box. 
You may already be familiar with our freshly cut flowers delivered through the letterbox, and so we hope that you enjoy this limited edition gift just as much! 
Now all you need to do is sit back and relax with a tipple or two. Cheers!
default_bouquet.long_description: Shake up Father's Day this year with our Gatsby-inspired gin cocktail kit. Curated by expert mixologists at Tipple Box, your Dad can relax with a refreshing drink on the day. A delicious way to say 'Cheers, Dad!' (and not a cufflink in sight.) Contains: 1 x Boston Cocktail Shaker set, 1 x RockRose gin miniature, 1 x Fever-tree ginger beer, 1 x Angostura Bitters miniature *Contains alcohol*

default_bouquet.name: The SW19
default_bouquet.description:
Quiet please!
As tennis takes to Centre Court this week, we're celebrating with this ace bouquet of bloom chrysanthemums and fragrant stocks. And of course no celebration is complete without champagne.
It's game, set and match with this luxurious limited edition gift. Only available for Wimbledon fortnight.
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope you enjoy The SW19: a bright summery arrangement inspired by The Championships at Centre Court. And of course nothing to do with Wimbledon should be without a glass of ice cold champagne.
Designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you, The SW19 comprises yellow pom pom chrysanthemums, purple stocks, white lisiathus and variegated pitto.
To enjoy your freshly-cut flowers for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45° angle before adding to your favourite vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your blooms at their best. 
Expert Tip: stocks don't require much water - a few centimetres is all they need. 
Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on Instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.long_description:
>"Anybody on for a game of tennis?"   
> - George Bernard Shaw, *Misalliance* 

Quiet please!
As tennis takes to Centre Court this week, we're celebrating with this ace bouquet of bloom chrysanthemums and fragrant stocks. And of course no celebration is complete without champagne.
It's game, set and match with this luxurious limited edition gift. Only available for Wimbledon fortnight.

_Contains one Hand-Tied bouquet and one 37.5 cl bottle of Moutard champagne. Gift Set arrives in the Hand-Tied box_
default_bouquet.long_instructions:
We hope you enjoy The SW19: a bright summery arrangement inspired by The Championships at Centre Court. And of course nothing to do with Wimbledon should be without a glass of ice cold champagne.

Designed by our florist and prepared by hand for you, The SW19 comprises yellow bloom chrysanthemums, purple stocks, cream lisiathus and variegated pitto.

To enjoy your freshly-cut flowers for as long as possible, snip each stem at a 45° angle before adding to your favourite vase. Re-trim every few days and change the water regularly to keep your blooms at their best. 

Expert Tip: stocks don't require much water - a few centimetres is all they need. 

Visit blog.bloomandwild.com for more flower arranging inspiration, and don't forget to share your styling with us on Instagram @bloomandwild.
default_bouquet.contents:
* 1 yellow pom pom chrysanthemums
* 1 purple stocks
* 1 white lisianthus
* 1 variegated pitto
* 1 Moutard champagne 375ml

default_bouquet.name: The Friendship Box
default_bouquet.description:
Treat your BFF to Raspberry and Champagne Marshmallows from The Marshmallowist, scented tealights from Beefayre, 3 doodle-ready notebooks from Caroline Gardner and luxurious hand therapy from Crabtree and Evelyn, all beautifully gift wrapped and delivered through their letterbox.
(Marshmallows contain small amounts of alcohol)
default_bouquet.instructions:
We hope that you enjoy The Friendship Box, a selection of gorgeous goodies exclusively curated by Bloom & Wild to celebrate Friendship Day.
We've chosen our favourite products from some of our own pals especially for you to pamper, doodle and relax (and a sweet treat too, of course.)
Your box contains 3 A5 notebooks from Caroline Gardner, scented tealights from Beefayre, luxury hand cream from Crabtree & Evelyn and Raspberry and Champagne marshmallows by The Marshmallowist.
Show your friend how much you love your gift on instagram with #yourethebest (you can tag us too @bloomandwild)
default_bouquet.long_description:
>"Friendship Never Ends"
- The Spice Girls

If you Wannabe the best BFF, treat your friend to Raspberry and Champagne Marshmallows from The Marshmallowist, scented tealights from Beefayre, 3 doodle-ready notebooks from Caroline Gardner and luxurious hand therapy from Crabtree and Evelyn. Curated by us, all beautifully gift wrapped and delivered through the letterbox, it's guaranteed to make her smile.
_Marshmallows contain small amounts of alcohol_
